resources.string: The size of an area that defines a favorite place. [m].
The minimum time spent in an area after which is considered to be a favorite [s].
How often to check the current position [s].
Max number of favorites to store.
How often the list of favorites should be updated [s].
Number of hits inside the area before the area is considered to be a favorite
Number of consecutive hits outside the area before the area is considered have been left.
The max accuracy for which a location shall be accepted. Set to 0.0 if all location data shall be used [m].
Are you sure you want to delete all favorites?
Start and stops the favorite locator. The locator continues to find favorites even after the app is closed.

When clicked a list of all (all filtered) favorites. When a favorite is shortly clicked the favorite can be handled according to:
 - Navigation
 - Show on map
 - Delete
 - Change kategori and description
 - Search for nearby known places and replace the saved favorite.
 A long click gives the option to delete the selected favorite

Creates a filter on which favorites should be shown on the map and in the favorite list. Two options are possible. 
1) filter on a specific date or current day. 
2) filter on the category 
3) filter on text in adress or description field of favorites. 
Click on the trashcan to remove the date filter. The category-, date and textsearch-filters are combined so those selected must be fulfilled for a favorite to be shown.

Indicates a favorite on the map that has not been given a category. Above the map this symbol shows the address of the last found favorite based on the current filter and when clicked the maps focus is moved to it.
Indicates the current position on the map. Above the map its address is shown and when clicked the maps focus is moved to it.
Settings. Each setting has thourougly description.
Share the favorites based the current filter for example to email. Depending of whats apps are installed.

FavoritePlaces lets you detect and store places you stayed in for a while. 
When running it regularly checks the position of your unit. If you stay within a particular area (configurable) for longer than a particular time (configurable), its GPS position, address (if available) and time spent is stored. The stored favorites can later be viewed on a map or in a list. 
 If a favorite is clicked on in the list or on the map, it can be given a category, one of Shopping, Restaurants, Café or Nature spot. 
Note: The GPS must not be turned on unless high accuracy is wanted. Many times the position retrieved by the radio network, wifi etc. is sufficient. Not using GPS saves power. 

Below are the different functions described in more detail (see also the descriptions in the settings).
 http://favoriteplaces.torsteneriksson.eu
Are you sure you want to delete this favorite?
Indicates which category the favorite has been selected for, shown in purple (example here is for a store).
Replace current position with the selected?

Indicates the current status of the favorite detection. Red means that no favorite candidate is found. Flashing green means favorite candidate is found but the minimum time has not been reached yet. Stable green means a favorite is found and it waits for area to be left so total time spent can be stored.
Saves current position as a favorite even if the time spent there has not been reached.
Only last 1000 favorites shared due too many favorites
